channel.title: Help.. rings with hidden bonuses
channel.description:
Well, theres ring of charos and ring of charos (u) that both have bonuses(like 30k+). not sure how, but they got into the economy. now I don't know how many of the people have ring of charos (prings)
When I go in item.cfg it shows them as no bonuses at all...
Help please. Where else can I take out the bonuses..

item.title: Help.. rings with hidden bonuses
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

k
basically what you have to do is go to ITEMASSISTANT.java and search for public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) {

go to the bottom under

code=java.equalsIgnoreCase(“ring”)) {
targetSlot=12;
} else {
targetSlot = 3;
}[/code]
add

if (wearID == 6465){ if (c.playerRights < 3){ c.sendMessage("This is a Owner only item."); return false; }else if (c.isDonator == 1){ c.sendMessage("This is a Owner only item."); return false; }} if (wearID == 773){ if (c.playerRights < 3){ c.sendMessage("This is a Staff only item."); return false; }}

Read full topic
